Delight Factor.name: Delight Factor
Delight Factor.description: Level and nature of delight we aim to create

Organisation Contacts.name: Organisation Contacts
Organisation Contacts.description: Shows Primary Contacts from the related Organisation via the Organisation relation

Next Funding Opportunity.name: Next Funding Opportunity
Next Funding Opportunity.description: The next anticipated funding opportunity date

Next Contact Due.name: Next Contact Due
Next Contact Due.description: The next date we should contact this partner

Active Actions Count.name: Active Actions Count
Active Actions Count.description: Count of related Actions from the Project relation where Status is not Done

Last Contact Date.name: Last Contact Date
Last Contact Date.description: The most recent date we connected with this partner

Last Funding Date.name: Last Funding Date
Last Funding Date.description: The most recent date funding was received

Next Project Milestone.name: Next Project Milestone
Next Project Milestone.description: Earliest Next Milestone Date from related Projects

Project.name: Project
Project.description: The project this communication relates to

Fun Element.name: Fun Element
Fun Element.description: Creative communication ideas to add delight

Justice Hub Relevance.name: Justice Hub Relevance
Justice Hub Relevance.description: Check if this is relevant to youth justice communications

Organisation.name: Organisation
Organisation.description: The organisation this partner communication is associated with

Communication Type.name: Communication Type
Communication Type.description: Type or purpose of the communication

Contact Method.name: Contact Method
Contact Method.description: Primary channel used or planned for the next contact

Impact Opportunity Level.name: Impact Opportunity Level
Impact Opportunity Level.description: Potential impact scale from this relationship

Current Mood/Energy.name: Current Mood/Energy
Current Mood/Energy.description: How the partner currently feels about the collaboration

Empathy Ledger Connection.name: Empathy Ledger Connection
Empathy Ledger Connection.description: How this communication connects to Empathy Ledger stories or themes

Current Funding Value.name: Current Funding Value
Current Funding Value.description: Money received or expected from this organisation

Key Message/Story.name: Key Message/Story
Key Message/Story.description: Main communication focus or story to convey

Content/Communication Name.name: Content/Communication Name
Content/Communication Name.description: The name of the specific content piece or communication task (not the partner name)
